mechanics.trigger: While under the effect of Haste
While under the effect of Haste
mechanics.outcome: Target gains a +2 bonus to AC

mechanics.trigger: When making a Dexterity Saving Throw
mechanics.outcome: Target has advantage on the saving throw

mechanics.trigger: At the start of the Target's Turn
When using the additional action granted by Haste
mechanics.condition: Target uses the additional action from Haste
mechanics.outcome: Action can only be Attack (one weapon attack), Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Object action

mechanics.trigger: When the Haste spell ends on the target
mechanics.condition: Target was previously affected by Haste
mechanics.outcome: Target cannot move or take actions until after its next turn

description_text: Choose a willing creature that you can see within range. Until the spell ends, the target's speed is doubled, it gains a +2 bonus to AC, it has advantage on dexterity saving throws, and it gains an additional action on each of its turns. That action can be used only to take the Attack (one weapon attack only), Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Object action.When the spell ends, the target can't move or take actions until after its next turn, as a wave of lethargy sweeps over it.
